content: Formulate a sentence with each word starting from the last letter of the alphabet and going in reverse order.

zygomorphic xenophobic woebegone voracious umbrageous topiary spirited rudimentary quixotic prurient ornate nuanced multitude nomadic mercurial loquacious kitsch judicious iconoclastic heterodox gibberish flamboyant effervescent dreadnought cryptic byzantine axiomatic.
